(BW/BM size was always consistent.  So yeah, I'd say they were all at least 7 
or so feet.  The Decepticon cassettes, at least Rumble and Frenzy, seemed to 
be about 7 or 8 feet.  There was a scene in G1 where Rumble and Spike were 
fighting and Rumble was only a few feet taller than him.  Then again in that 
episode Spike punched Rumble down for the count and didn't even hurt his hand 
against that Cybertronian alloy :)
